NK045(bi)006:1: // sher phyin rgyan gyi spyi don bsgom rim nyung ngu gzhung lugs legs bshad bzhugs so //
NK045(bi)006:3: shes bya mkhyen pa gsum gyi de nyid shes //
NK045(bi)006:4: nyams len sbyor ba bzhi yi lam la bslab //
NK045(bi)006:5: thob bya 'bras bu chos skur sbyor mdzad pa'i //
NK045(bi)006:6: 'phags bod mkhas grub rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK045(bi)006:7: de la 'dir skal ba dang ldan pa'i gang zag
NK045(bi)006:8: gis mthar thug gi 'bras bu chos kyi sku mngon
NK045(bi)006:9: du bya ba'i thabs ma nor bar nyams su blang
NK045(bi)006:13: dang po la gang dag gcig shes na bsam pa
NK045(bi)006:14: byang chub kyi sems tshul bzhin du rgyud la skye
NK045(bi)006:15: bar 'gyur ba shes bya gtan la dbab pa'i chos
NK045(bi)006:16: la gsum / dang po thob bya mthar thug gi 'bras bu shes dgos te /
NK045(bi)006:17: de ma shes na smon pa sems bskyed kyi dmigs pa mi shes /
NK045(bi)006:18: gnyis pa de thob byed lam gyi mtshan nyid shes dgos /
NK045(bi)006:19: de ma shes na 'jug pa sems bskyed kyi nyams len mi shes /
NK045(bi)006:20: gsum pa lam de'i gol sa spong ba'i tshul shes dgos /
NK045(bi)006:21: de ma shes na don dam sems bskyed rgyud la
NK045(bi)006:22: mi skye zhing stong nyid snying rje zung du mi
NK045(bi)006:23: 'brel lo // de'i phyir dang po kho nar 'dir ltar bsam ste /
NK045(bi)006:24: thog ma med pa'i dus nas drin gyis bskyangs pa'i
NK045(bi)006:25: ma rgan sems can thams cad 'khor ba sdug bsngal
NK045(bi)006:26: gyi rgya mtsho'i rba la g.yengs nas sdug bsngal sna
NK045(bi)006:27: tshogs la spyod pa 'di rnams snying re rje /
NK045(bi)006:28: bdag gis da res brtson 'grus kyi stobs bskyed de
NK045(bi)006:29: ma sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rnam grangs
NK045(bi)006:30: thams cad las bskyabs nas bde ba'i go sar dbugs
NK045(bi)006:31: dbyung bar bya'o snyam du theg chen chos kyi rtsa
NK045(bi)006:32: ba snying rje'i bsam pa bskyed pa na /
NK045(bi)006:33: sems can sdug bsngal ba la mi bzod pa'i blo /
NK045(bi)006:34: ma lag rdum gyi bu chus khyer ba lta bu'i
NK045(bi)006:35: blo skyes na theg pa chen po'i rigs sad pa
NK045(bi)006:36: yin te chos zab mo 'di'i snod du gyur pa'i
NK045(bi)006:38: de lta bu'i gdul byed la thog mar 'di lta bu'i blo skye ste /
NK045(bi)006:39: bdag gis sems thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa la /
NK045(bi)006:40: da lta rang yang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag las
NK045(bi)006:41: mthar zhing de spong ba'i thabs kyang mi shes na
NK045(bi)006:42: gzhan gyi don sgrub par ga la nus /
NK045(bi)006:43: de'i phyir mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi
NK045(bi)006:44: don 'bad pa dang rtsol ba med par sgrub nus
NK045(bi)006:46: de lta bu zhig yod na ni bdag gis de
NK045(bi)006:47: kho na ltar sgrub par bya'o snyam pa'i blo skyes
NK045(bi)006:50: de lta bu'i thabs ni yod pa kho na ste /
NK045(bi)006:51: dang por sems can thams cad kyi don du sems
NK045(bi)006:52: bskyed pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis rnam pa thams
NK045(bi)006:53: cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon du byas te rang
NK045(bi)006:54: nyid gang nas gsheg sa pa'i lam de gzhan la'ang
NK045(bi)006:55: ston pa ni 'bad pa dang rtsol ba med par
NK045(bi)006:56: mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi don lhun gyi grub
NK045(bi)006:58: de lta bu'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de yang ji lta bu zhig yin snyam na /
NK045(bi)006:59: de yang gong du rang nyid gang du gshegs pa
NK045(bi)006:60: zhes pas rgyus 'bras bu mtshon te sems bskyed la
NK045(bi)006:61: sogs pa chos bcu po sa rim gyis sgrubs pa'i
NK045(bi)006:62: 'bras bu mthar thug pa ni rnam mkhyen yin no
NK045(bi)006:63: zhes shes la / de gzhan la ston pa zhes
NK045(bi)006:64: pas ni yul gyi yul can mtshon te yul sems
NK045(bi)006:65: bskyed la sogs pa'i don bcu po tshul bzhin du
NK045(bi)006:66: shes nas gzhan la ston pa ni rnam mkhyen yin
NK045(bi)006:68: de yang rnam mkhyen shes par bya ba la rnam
NK045(bi)006:69: mkhyen rang gi mtshan nyid kyis mi ston par rgyu
NK045(bi)006:70: dang yul gyis mtshon nas 'chad cing dgos zhe na
NK045(bi)006:71: / de gnyis kyis ma mtshon par 'chad mi nus te /
NK045(bi)006:72: dper na mig shes 'chad pa na rgyu mig dbang sogs las skyes pa zhes sam /
NK045(bi)006:73: yul sngon po 'dzin pa sogs kyis ston gyi de
NK045(bi)006:74: gnyis gang rung la ma brten par ston mi nus
NK045(bi)006:75: pa bzhin no // yang rnam mkhyen ni shes bya ma lus pa mkhyen pa ma yin nam /
NK045(bi)006:76: 'di bcu tsam mkhyen pas rnam mkhyen du ji ltar 'gyur snyam na /
NK045(bi)006:77: 'dir gzhan don 'bad med du sgrub pa la bcu
NK045(bi)006:78: po 'di nges par mkhyen dgos pas nyer mkho gtso
NK045(bi)006:79: bo'i sgo nas smos kyi gzhan mi mkhyen pa yang
NK045(bi)006:80: ma yinate / ring na gnas pa'i khab mthong bas
NK045(bi)006:81: drung na gnas pa'i gri mthong bar nges pa bzhin
NK045(bi)006:82: dka' ba'i gnas 'di lta bu mkhyen pas de las
NK045(bi)006:83: sla ba gzhan mkhyen par shugs kyis grub bo //
NK045(bi)006:84: 'di'i skabs su kha cig don bcu mkhyen pas shes bya ma lus pa mkhyen par 'gyur te /
NK045(bi)006:85: dmigs pa chos rnams thams cad de zhes pas der de 'dus so zhes zer yang /
NK045(bi)006:86: de tsam la khyab pa med de /
NK045(bi)006:87: dper na byang chub sems dpa' lam sgom pa'i tshe
NK045(bi)006:88: lam gyi dmigs pa shes par byas nas chos thams
NK045(bi)006:89: cad stong nyid du sgom pa sogs yod kyang de
NK045(bi)006:90: tsam gyis de thams cad mkhyen par mi 'gyur ba
NK045(bi)006:91: bzhin no // de yang yin te /
NK045(bi)006:92: de dge mi dge lung ma bstan gsum la blang
NK045(bi)006:93: dor du dmigs pa'i chos de gsum shes kyang dgos
NK045(bi)006:94: shing chos thams cad de gsum du 'dus mod kyis
NK045(bi)006:95: de gsum shes pa tsam gyis thams cad mkhyen par
NK045(bi)006:96: mi 'gyur ro // de nas yang skal ldan de 'di snyam du /
NK045(bi)006:97: da ni bdag gis de lta bu'i rnam pa thams
NK045(bi)006:98: cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de ci nas kyang thob
NK045(bi)006:99: par bya dgos pas de thob byed kyi lam ji
NK045(bi)006:100: lta bu zhig la slob par bya snyam pa'i tshe
NK045(bi)006:101: / 'bras bu ni rgyu'i rjes su byed pa nyid
NK045(bi)006:102: kyi phyir 'bras bu dang rjes su mthun pa'i lam
NK045(bi)006:103: nyid la slob dgos pas sems can gyi don la
NK045(bi)006:105: sems can rnams ni rigs dang bsam pa tha dad
NK045(bi)006:106: pa nyid kyi phyir lam gcig kho nas rjes su
NK045(bi)006:107: 'dzin par mi nus pas theg pa gsum gyi lam
NK045(bi)006:108: thams cad shes pa dang mthong bas mngon sum du
NK045(bi)006:109: byas nas gzhan la bstan par bya'o snyam du shes
NK045(bi)006:110: shing gzhan phan gyi bsam pa la blo slob dgos
NK045(bi)006:111: te / des rgyud la 'jug pa sems bskyed skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)006:113: don de nyid kyi phyir bdag gis theg pa gsum
NK045(bi)006:114: gyi lam thams cad bslab par bya mod kyi bdag
NK045(bi)006:115: ni mthar thug gi theg pa chen po kho na
NK045(bi)006:116: don du gnyer ba yin pas lam gong 'og gi
NK045(bi)006:117: khyad par tshul bzhin du shes nas dman pa'i lam
NK045(bi)006:118: du ma go la bar bya'o snyam nas thabs snying
NK045(bi)006:119: rje chen po dang ma bral ba'i ngang nas gzhi
NK045(bi)006:120: phung po khams dang skye mched la sgro 'dogs so
NK045(bi)006:121: gnyis dang bral ba'i de kho na nyid kyi don
NK045(bi)006:122: sgom ste / de lta na de'i rgyud la ring
NK045(bi)006:123: por mi thogs par don dam sems bskyed skye bar
NK045(bi)006:124: sgom ste / 'gyur ro // de ltar mkhyen pa
NK045(bi)006:125: gsum po 'di rim bzhin snga phyi rgyu 'bras yin
NK045(bi)006:126: pas thos bsam gyis shes par bya zhing sems bskyed
NK045(bi)006:127: kyis yul du byed pa'i tshe na ni /
NK045(bi)006:128: dang po kho nar thob kyi mthar thug gi 'bras
NK045(bi)006:129: bu la smon pa 'byung ba'i phyir rnam mkhyen nas
NK045(bi)006:130: thog mar smos la gang zag gi rgyud la skye
NK045(bi)006:131: rim gyis nyams len dang sbyar na /
NK045(bi)006:132: dang po rang gi rgyud la gzhi'i chos thams cad
NK045(bi)006:133: bdag med par rtogs pa'i mngon par shes pa dang
NK045(bi)006:134: / dman lam las khyad par du byed pa'i snying
NK045(bi)006:135: rje chen po thun mong ma yin pa rgyud la
NK045(bi)006:136: / bskyed nas / rigs can gsum gyi gdul bya
NK045(bi)006:137: la rang rang dang rjes su mthun pa'i lam ston
NK045(bi)006:138: pa'i sgo nas rdzogs smin sbyangs te 'bras bu rnam
NK045(bi)006:139: pa thams cad mkhyen pa mngon du byed pa'i phyir
NK045(bi)006:140: de'i go rim dang sbyar nas mjug sdud kyi skabs
NK045(bi)006:141: / bskyed nas / su / de ltar 'di dang yang 'di dang /
NK045(bi)006:142: sogs kyis gzhi shes nas thog mar bsdus so //
NK045(bi)006:143: des na gsum po 'di'i mtshan nyid ma nor bar
NK045(bi)006:144: thos bsam gyis gtan la phab nas sems bskyed kyi
NK045(bi)006:145: yul du bya ba nyid kyi phyir /
NK045(bi)006:146: mngon rtogs drug tu bsdu ba'i skabs su mtshan nyid ces dang /
NK045(bi)006:147: gsum du bsdu ba'i skabs su yul ni rnam pa gsum po zhes 'byung ngo //
NK045(bi)006:149: thos bsam gyis shes bya gtan la 'beb pa'i tshe yul gyis yul can nam /
NK045(bi)006:150: yul can gyis yul mtshon nas chos 'di dag ni
NK045(bi)006:151: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes nyag gcig
NK045(bi)006:152: gis gzhal bya'o // chos chos 'di dag ni rnam
NK045(bi)006:153: mkhyen gyi yul yang yin mod kyi byang chub sems
NK045(bi)006:154: dpa' rnams kyi lam shes kyi yul yang yin no
NK045(bi)006:155: gis gzhal bya'o // // 'di dag ni snga ma
NK045(bi)006:156: gnyis kyi yul du ma zad nyan thos dang rang
NK045(bi)006:157: sangs rgyas kyi gzhi shes kyi yul yang yin no
NK045(bi)006:158: zhes shes par byed pas 'khor 'das lam gsum gyis
NK045(bi)006:159: bsdus pa'i chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid la sgro
NK045(bi)006:161: sems bskyed kyi yul du byed pa'i tshe yul gyis
NK045(bi)006:162: yul can mtshon pa kho nas yul 'di dang 'di
NK045(bi)006:163: dag tshul 'di ltar mkhyen nas bya ba 'di lta
NK045(bi)006:164: bu byed par nus pa'i theg pa gsum mam /
NK045(bi)006:165: gang zag bzhi'i rtogs rigs thams cad rang rgyud la
NK045(bi)006:166: bskyed par bya'o snyam du dam bca' ba'i phyir theg
NK045(bi)006:167: chen sems bskyed mtshan nyid par 'gyur te /
NK045(bi)006:169: theg pa ye shes kun tu 'gro la mkhas par ldan /
NK045(bi)006:170: zhes theg pa kun tu 'gro ba dang /
NK045(bi)006:171: ye shes kun tu 'gro ba'i don dang po nas khas len mchog tu bshad pa bzhin no //
NK045(bi)006:172: des na 'di gsum sems bskyed dang sbyor ba'i tshe
NK045(bi)006:173: sngar bshad pa ltar smon pa dang 'jug pa dang
NK045(bi)006:174: don dam sems bskyed gsum gyi rgyur yang nges la
NK045(bi)006:175: / yang na 'dun pa dang bsam pa dang lhag
NK045(bi)006:176: pa'i bsam pa gsum gyi rgyu yang yin te rim
NK045(bi)006:177: pa bzhin dang po thob bya rnam mkhyen la don
NK045(bi)006:178: du gnyer ba'i mdun pa skye zhing /
NK045(bi)006:179: de nas de'i rgyur lam shes la brten nas gzhan phan don gnyer gyi bsam pa skye zhing /
NK045(bi)006:180: de la yang dman lam gyi gol sa spangs nas
NK045(bi)006:181: mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pa'i tshul la slob pas
NK045(bi)006:182: bsam pa de nyid rang 'dod dang bral nas lhag
NK045(bi)006:183: par gyur pa na lhag bsam mo //
NK045(bi)006:184: de nas sbyor ba sems bskyed sogs la 'jug ste shes par sla'o //
NK045(bi)006:185: yang na 'di gsum dkon mchog gsum rang rgyud la
NK045(bi)006:186: 'grub pa'i tshul rgyud bla'i 'grel bar bshad pa dang
NK045(bi)006:188: dang po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pas sangs rgyas
NK045(bi)006:189: kyi ye shes ston pas chos thams cad mngon par
NK045(bi)006:190: rdzogs pa sangs rgyas pa zhes dang /
NK045(bi)006:191: gnyis pa lam shes kyi skabs su theg pa gsum
NK045(bi)006:192: gyi lam thams cad ston pas chos kyi 'khor lo
NK045(bi)006:193: legs par bskor ba zhes dang /
NK045(bi)006:194: gsum pa gzhi shes kyi skabs su theg pa gong
NK045(bi)006:195: 'og gi gang zag gi rtogs pa'i khyad par ston
NK045(bi)006:196: pa'i phyir / slob ma'i tshogs dul ba mtha' yas bskor ba zhes bya ste rnam grangs tsam mo //
NK045(bi)006:197: 'di dag gi skabs su gzhi shes ni mdo rang
NK045(bi)006:198: gzhung du mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pa'i gnyen po
NK045(bi)006:199: gzhi shes dngos su bstan pas mtha' gang rung du
NK045(bi)006:200: lhung ba'i mi mthun phyogs kyi gzhi shes shugs kyis
NK045(bi)006:201: rtogs par bya ba las nyan rang gi rtogs rigs
NK045(bi)006:202: dngos su bshad pa med pas na /
NK045(bi)006:203: gzhan gyis myong ba ma yin pa zhes bshad do //
NK045(bi)006:204: de na skabs 'dir gzhi shes nyid gol sar bshad pa dang /
NK045(bi)006:205: lam shes rang rgyud la bskyed pa'i thabs su bshad pa dang /
NK045(bi)006:206: don dam sems bskyed skye ba'i rgyur bshad pa la
NK045(bi)006:207: blo chung dag dogs pa phra mo skye ba'i gzhi
NK045(bi)006:208: yod kyang / don du mi mthun phyogs kyi gol
NK045(bi)006:209: sa mtha' dag bcad nas sgro skur dang bral ba'i
NK045(bi)006:210: gnyen po gzhi shes mtshan nyid pa rgyud la bskyed
NK045(bi)006:211: pa na de theg pa chen po'i lam shes pa
NK045(bi)006:212: yin zhing don dam sems bskyed kyang yin la de'i
NK045(bi)006:213: zhar la nyan rang gi lam yang shes par 'gyur
NK045(bi)006:214: bas 'gal ba med cing yang lam shes skabs su
NK045(bi)006:215: bshad pa'i nyan rang gi lam ni de'i rigs can
NK045(bi)006:216: gyi gang zag rjes su bzung ba'i phyir theg chen
NK045(bi)006:217: gyi lam dang mi 'gal ba'i theg dman gyi bdag
NK045(bi)006:218: med pa'i don gyi rtogs rigs rang rgyud la bskyed
NK045(bi)006:219: nas gzhan la ston pa yin la /
NK045(bi)006:220: spang bya gzhi shes ni theg chen lam dang 'gal
NK045(bi)006:221: ba'i theg dman gyi rgyud kyi bden zhen gyi sgro
NK045(bi)006:222: 'dogs dang rang don zhi ba phyogs gcig sogs ston
NK045(bi)006:223: pa yin pas 'di gnyis mi zlos pa yang yin
NK045(bi)006:224: no // 'di gsum dang mngon rtogs phyi ma lnga sbyor ba'i tshe /
NK045(bi)006:225: rnam rtse gnyis gtso bor gzhi shes kyi sbyor ba dang /
NK045(bi)006:226: mthar skad gnyis lam shes kyi sbyor ba /
NK045(bi)006:227: 'bras bu chos sku ni rnam mkhyen dngos yin pas
NK045(bi)006:228: bsam sbyor gyi khyad par las brgyad po gsum du
NK045(bi)006:229: 'du bas mchod brjod las kyang gsum po 'di ston
NK045(bi)006:230: pas / mchod brjod du gzhung don ma lus pa 'du ba'i don yang de yin no //
NK045(bi)006:231: 'dir sbyor bzhi dang mkhyen pa gnyis sbyor ba'i tshe gtso bor zhes smos pa'i don /
NK045(bi)006:232: gtso che ba'i dbang gis de ltar sbyang nas bshad na lam gyi 'brel dang /
NK045(bi)006:234: bsdu ba la go ba skye bar phan pas smos
NK045(bi)006:235: kyi rnam pa kun tu khyab pa yod pa ni
NK045(bi)006:236: ma yin te / rnam rdzogs kyi skabs su mkhyen pa gsum ga'i sbyor ba bshad pa bzhin no //
NK045(bi)006:237: 'phags pas bshad cing mkhas pas bkral ba'i don /
NK045(bi)006:238: shes rab gsum gyis gtan la legs phebs pa /
NK045(bi)006:239: mkhyen pa gsum gyi bsdus don 'di yin te /
NK045(bi)006:240: 'di las gzhan du 'chad par dka' 'am snyam /
NK045(bi)006:241: spyi don gnyis pa theg pa chen po'i lam gyi sbyor ba ni gnyis te /
NK045(bi)006:242: rtogs pa rang dbang du bya ba rnam rdzogs sbyor ba dang /
NK045(bi)006:243: rtogs pa brtan par bya ba rim gyis pa'i sbyor ba'o //
NK045(bi)006:244: de la rtogs pa rang dbang du bya ba zhes
NK045(bi)006:245: pa'i don ni sngar mkhyen pa gsum gyis mtshon nas
NK045(bi)006:246: shes bya'i thams cad kyi mtshan nyid shes par byas
NK045(bi)006:247: shing / theg pa gsum gyi rtogs rigs thams cad smon pa'i yul du byas kyang /
NK045(bi)006:248: rtogs pa'i yon tan phra mo tsam la yang rang dbang thob pa ni med de /
NK045(bi)006:249: dper na phyug po chen po zhig gi longs spyod
NK045(bi)006:250: thams cad bran khol dbul po des shes shing rtsi
NK045(bi)006:251: bgrangs byed kyang rang dbang du longs spyod chog pa
NK045(bi)006:252: ni kham tsam yang med pa bzhin no //
NK045(bi)006:253: des na dang po mi rtag pa'i rnam pa nas
NK045(bi)006:254: bzung ste mthar sangs rgyas nyid kyi rnam pa'i bar
NK045(bi)006:255: thams cad bden gnyis zung 'jug gi tshul du bsgoms
NK045(bi)006:256: te rtogs pa ma skyes pa bskyed par byed pa
NK045(bi)006:257: la rtogs pa dbang du bya ba zhes bya'o //
NK045(bi)006:258: de nas rtogs pa brtan par byed pa ni sngar
NK045(bi)006:259: rang rgyud la skyes pa'i sgom thams cad snga phyi
NK045(bi)006:260: sgrel te go rim bzhin du mngon du byed pa
NK045(bi)006:261: dang / ma skyes pa rnams kyang go rim bzhin
NK045(bi)006:262: du thos bsam gyis 'dris par byas nas rgyud la
NK045(bi)006:263: skye ba'i phyir smon pa dang brtson pa'i sgo nas
NK045(bi)006:264: sngar rgyud la skyes pa'i rtogs pa thams cad goms
NK045(bi)006:266: de yang dper na byis pa la yi ge slob
NK045(bi)006:267: pa'i tshe dang por ka kha zhes yi ge'i phyi
NK045(bi)006:268: mo dang 'bru ded la brten nas yi ge re
NK045(bi)006:269: re nas slob pa lta bu ni rnams rdzogs sbyor
NK045(bi)006:270: ba yin la / phyi nas sngar shes pa'i yig
NK045(bi)006:271: 'bru de dag mang po zung du sbrel nas sangs
NK045(bi)006:272: rgyas zhes pa lta bu'i sbyor klog slob cing de
NK045(bi)006:273: yang goms pas byang bar byed pa lta bu ni
NK045(bi)006:274: rim gyis pa'i sgom yin no //
NK045(bi)006:275: rtse mo dang skad cig ma gnyis ni sbyor ba
NK045(bi)006:276: snga ma gnyis po 'di goms pa rab tu gyur
NK045(bi)006:277: pa'i lam gyi tshad 'dzin lta bu yin pas sgom
NK045(bi)006:279: de yang rnam rdzogs sbyor goms par bcu gyur pa'i gnas skabs bzhi ste /
NK045(bi)006:280: 'jig rten pa'i lam du gzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa
NK045(bi)006:281: bzhi po mgo gnon gyi gnyen por 'gyur nges pa'i
NK045(bi)006:282: rtags dang rnam 'phel la sogs pa'i yon tan rgyud
NK045(bi)006:283: la skyes pa na sbyor lam rtse mo yin te
NK045(bi)006:284: 'jig rten pa'i sgom byung gi rtogs pa de las
NK045(bi)006:286: 'phags pa'i lam gyis dang por mthong spang gzung 'dzin
NK045(bi)006:287: gyi rtog pa bzhi po rtsad nas 'don pa'i gnyen
NK045(bi)006:288: po mthong lam rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes
NK045(bi)006:289: rgyud la skyes pa na mthong lam rtse mo yin
NK045(bi)006:290: te / chos nyid mngon sum du mthong ba'i mnyam
NK045(bi)006:291: bzhag gi rtogs pa de las gong du 'gror med
NK045(bi)006:292: te / pa'i phyir ro // de'i mjug thogs su
NK045(bi)006:293: sgom spang gzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa bzhi po rtsad
NK045(bi)006:294: nas 'don pa'i gnyen po rgyud la skyes shing rnam
NK045(bi)006:295: pa thams cad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la brten nas
NK045(bi)006:296: 'jig rten pa'i phan bde ji snyed pa bsgrub pa
NK045(bi)006:297: la rang dbang thob pa na sgom lam rtse mo
NK045(bi)006:298: yin te lam pa'i dbang du byas pa'i sgom pa'i
NK045(bi)006:299: ting nge 'dzin de las gong du 'gror med pas
NK045(bi)006:300: te / pa'i phyir ro // so // de'i mthar
NK045(bi)006:301: bden pa gnyis la tha dad dam bzang ngan nam
NK045(bi)006:302: 'gal 'dur 'dzin pa'i zhen snang phra mo'ang rtsad nas
NK045(bi)006:303: spangs te dmigs rnam rgyu gsum gyis mtshon pa'i ye
NK045(bi)006:304: shes rnam par mi rtog pa rgyud la skyes pa
NK045(bi)006:305: na mthar lam rtse mo yin te mthar thug gi
NK045(bi)006:306: thob bya 'bras bu chos kyi sku dang lam gzhan
NK045(bi)006:307: gyis bar du ma chod pa'i phyir ro //
NK045(bi)006:308: rim gyis pa'i sbyor ba goms pa mthar thug pa'i gnas skabs ni skad cig ma yin te /
NK045(bi)006:309: zag med kyi chos gcig mngon du byas pa na
NK045(bi)006:310: sngar ji snyed cig mngon du byas pa'i zag med
NK045(bi)006:311: kyi chos thams cad gnyis su med pa dang /
NK045(bi)006:312: mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul gyis mngon du byed par
NK045(bi)006:313: nus pa lam mthar phyin pa'i gnas skabs te 'di
NK045(bi)006:314: dang sngar gyi bar chad med rtse gnyis ni mnyam
NK045(bi)006:315: rjes kyi ldog pas phye ba tsam ma gtogs tha
NK045(bi)006:316: dad med do // de na sgom bya dngos ni
NK045(bi)006:317: rnam rdzogs sbyor ba dang rim gyis pa gnyis yin
NK045(bi)006:318: dad med do // la / de yang gzhung gi
NK045(bi)006:319: go rim dang bstun na rnam rdzogs sbyor ba la
NK045(bi)006:320: brten nas rtse mo rgyud la skyes pa na rim
NK045(bi)006:321: gyis pa sgom pa lta bu zhig byung yang /
NK045(bi)006:322: de ni rgyu 'bras cha re lto sbrel nas bshad
NK045(bi)006:323: pa'i go rim yin gyi sgom pa nyams su blang
NK045(bi)006:324: ba'i go rim ma yin pas sgom pa'i tshe da
NK045(bi)006:325: lta las dang po pa'i skabs nas gnyis ka sgom
NK045(bi)006:326: du yod de / dper na thos bsam gyi dbang
NK045(bi)006:327: du byas pa'i mthar gyis pa'ang bshad pa bzhin no
NK045(bi)006:328: du yod de / // de'i phyir sbyor ba 'di
NK045(bi)006:329: gnyis sgom pa'i tshul mtshan pa'i sgo tsam lag len
NK045(bi)006:331: dang po rnam rdzogs sbyor ba'i skabs su spyir mkhyen
NK045(bi)006:332: pa gsum gyi rnam pa thams cad rnam pa brgya
NK045(bi)006:333: don gsum du bsdus te bsgom par bya ba yin
NK045(bi)006:334: la / de las gzhi shes kyi rnam pa dang
NK045(bi)006:335: po mi rtag pa'i rnam pa sgom tshul la mtshon
NK045(bi)006:336: la / na / yul 'dus byas kyis bsdus pa'i
NK045(bi)006:337: chos thams cad skad cig ma'i rgyun gyi phreng ba
NK045(bi)006:338: skye 'gag gi rang bzhin du gnas pa ni don
NK045(bi)006:339: la / na / rnam yin la / don mi
NK045(bi)006:340: rtag pa'i tshul de nyid lung rigs gtan tshig la
NK045(bi)006:341: brten nas blos sgro 'dogs gcod pa'i tshul gyis sgom
NK045(bi)006:342: pa ni shes rnam yin te nyan thos rang lam
NK045(bi)006:344: theg chen du theg pa thams cad kyi rtogs rigs
NK045(bi)006:345: rgyud la skyed dgos pas de tsam gyis mi chog
NK045(bi)006:346: ste / de'i don shes kyi rnam pa gnyis ka'ang yul du byas nas sbyor bas bsgom dgos la /
NK045(bi)006:347: sbyor ba nyi shur bshad kyang de las gsum ni
NK045(bi)006:348: mkhyen pa gsum po'i rtogs tshul gyi dbye ba tsam
NK045(bi)006:349: dang bco lnga ni sa mtshams kyi dbye ba yin
NK045(bi)006:350: pas bsgom bya dngos mi gnas pa'i sbyor ba dang
NK045(bi)006:351: mi sbyor ba'i gnyis kho na'o //
NK045(bi)006:352: de la mi gnas pa'i sgom pa ni yul la zhen spyod 'gog pa'i sgom yin la /
NK045(bi)006:353: 'di'i tshe mi rtag pa'i rnam pa nyid yul yin pas /
NK045(bi)006:354: mi rtag pa'i tshul du shes pa de yang tha
NK045(bi)006:355: snyad kun rdzob kyi rtogs tshul tsam yin gyi don
NK045(bi)006:356: dam par na mi rtag pa tsam du'ang bden par
NK045(bi)006:357: grub pa med par shes nas blo zhen pa dang
NK045(bi)006:358: bcas pas mi gnas pa ni mi gnas pa'i sbyor
NK045(bi)006:359: ba / de ltar mi rtag pa stong nyid du
NK045(bi)006:360: shes nas sgom byed kyi blo yang mtha' gang du'ang
NK045(bi)006:361: ma grub pa'i stong nyid yin pa'i phyir gang gis
NK045(bi)006:362: gang la ji ltar rnal 'byor du byed pa ma
NK045(bi)006:363: dmigs pas bsgom pa zhes bya ba'ang tha snyad du
NK045(bi)006:364: sgro btags tsam ma gtogs don la bsgom par bya
NK045(bi)006:365: ba rdul tsam yang med par shes pa ni yul
NK045(bi)006:366: dang yul can sbyor ba'i sgom pa nyid med par
NK045(bi)006:367: shes pa'i phyir mi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yin no
NK045(bi)006:368: ba / // 'di yul can la zhen spyod bkag pa'i sgom yin no //
NK045(bi)006:369: sbyor ba 'di gnyis la gzhan du gnas pa dang
NK045(bi)006:370: rnal 'byor 'gog pa zhes kyang bshad de rnal 'byor
NK045(bi)006:371: dang sbyor ba ni don gcig go //
NK045(bi)006:372: yang chos skad gzhan dang sbyar na bsgom bya sgom
NK045(bi)006:373: byed med pa zhes pa'ang 'di gnyis kho na yin
NK045(bi)006:374: te / mi gnas pa'i sbyor ba ni bsgom bya med pa'i don dang /
NK045(bi)006:375: mi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba ni sgom byed pa'i don to //
NK045(bi)006:376: yang gang yid la mi byed pa yum don du
NK045(bi)006:377: bshad pa rnam kyang 'di kho na yin te yul
NK045(bi)006:378: dang yul can gang la'ang bden zhen gyis yid la
NK045(bi)006:379: mi phyed pa'o // yang na yul gang du'ang ma
NK045(bi)006:380: grub pas blos cir yang mi 'dzin pa ni mi
NK045(bi)006:382: cir yang mi 'dzin pa de nyid rnal 'byor rnams
NK045(bi)006:383: kyi mchog yin pa ni mi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i
NK045(bi)006:384: don te / mi bsgom pa'i sgom pa zhes pa dang gnad gcig cing /
NK045(bi)006:386: bsgom par lta ba med rnams kyi //
NK045(bi)006:387: bsgom pa dam par 'dod pa ste //
NK045(bi)006:389: des na yum sher phyin gyi don bsgom par bya
NK045(bi)006:390: ba'i dngos gzhi mthar thug pa ni 'di kho na
NK045(bi)006:391: yin pas don gnad 'di nyid la snying thag pa
NK045(bi)006:392: nas sgro 'dogs chod par bya dgos kyi gzhung gi
NK045(bi)006:393: tshig tshogs nyung ba tsam la brten nas gnad 'di
NK045(bi)006:394: dag zhar byung tsam du byed cing don /
NK045(bi)006:395: med pa'i bshad yam mang po la kha bde bde
NK045(bi)006:396: mo byed pa ni zab mo don gyi chos skal
NK045(bi)006:398: de'i phyir rgya bod kyi mkhas grub stong gi gzhung
NK045(bi)006:399: lugs dang sgom yig ji snyed pa yang gnad zhen
NK045(bi)006:400: med gcig po 'di'i steng du chu brgya zam gcig
NK045(bi)006:401: ltar 'du bar shes pas chos skad tha dad tsam
NK045(bi)006:402: la 'gal 'dur bzung nas chags sdang gis dgag sgrub
NK045(bi)006:403: mi dgos shing kun la'ang yid ches pa'i nges shes
NK045(bi)006:404: kyi dad pas glo ba dga' ba 'di kho bos
NK045(bi)006:405: sher phyin la thos bsam byas pa'i lag rjes yin
NK045(bi)006:406: par sems so // de yang chos thams cad stong
NK045(bi)006:407: pa nyid yin pas ci yang sgom du med do
NK045(bi)006:408: zhes chad par bltas nas tha mal du sdod pa
NK045(bi)006:410: don dam par na yul dang yul can gyis mtshon
NK045(bi)006:411: pa'i chos thams cad rang bzhin spros bral skye med
NK045(bi)006:412: blo las 'das pa'i tshul du shes pas gang la'ang
NK045(bi)006:414: kun rdzob sgyu ma lta bur sbyor ba sems bskyed /
NK045(bi)006:416: mjug bsngo ba gsum gyis zin pa'i ngang nas ma gi 'dus byas mi rtag pa nas bzung ste /
NK045(bi)006:417: ya gi sangs rgyas nyid kyi rnam pa'i bar thams
NK045(bi)006:418: cad mi bsgom pa'i tshul du bsgom zhing rang rgyud
NK045(bi)006:420: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di'i stong
NK045(bi)006:421: nyid bsgom pa'i tshul bla na med pa yin te
NK045(bi)006:423: shing mkhan bzo bo mkhas pas skyes pa bud med dang /
NK045(bi)006:424: 'dra ba'i bzo byas de yang bya ba thams cad byed /
NK045(bi)006:425: de bzhin shes rab spyod mkhas byang chub sems dpa' yang /
NK045(bi)006:426: rnam par mi rtog ye shes bya ba thams cad byed /
NK045(bi)006:428: gzhi shes kyi skabs su yang shes byed snang ba
NK045(bi)006:429: rnam bdun gyis chos thams cad mtshon nas de dag
NK045(bi)006:430: kyang rlom med bzhi'i sgo nas sgom par bshad pa
NK045(bi)006:431: bzhin no // de ltar bsgom pas gnas skabs su
NK045(bi)006:432: theg pa gsum gyi rtogs rigs ma tshang ba med
NK045(bi)006:434: mthar thug de dag thams cad kyang stong nyid spros
NK045(bi)006:435: bral zhen med gcig gi klong du dag ste snang
NK045(bi)006:436: stong thabs shes tshogs gnyis zung du 'jug pa 'di
NK045(bi)006:437: kho na rgyal ba dgyes pa'i lam bzang bla na
NK045(bi)006:438: med pa yin par blo gros dang ldan pa rnams
NK045(bi)006:439: kyis rtogs par bya dgos so //
NK045(bi)006:440: 'di'i skabs su stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs
NK045(bi)006:441: sangs rgyas kho na'i mkhyen pa'i rnam pa 'ga' zhig
NK045(bi)006:442: ni da lta dngos su bsgom du med kyang ma
NK045(bi)006:443: 'ongs pa na rang rgyud la skyed par 'dun pa
NK045(bi)006:444: dang smon pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa yin la /
NK045(bi)006:445: sa thob nas ni 'di dag dngos med kyang rigs
NK045(bi)006:446: 'dra rang rgyud la bskyed du yod par gsungs so
NK045(bi)006:447: // gnyis pa rim gyis pa'i sgom ni /
NK045(bi)006:448: de ltar mkhyen pa gsum gyi rnam pa ji snyed
NK045(bi)006:449: pa rnam pa brgya don gsum du bsdus nas re
NK045(bi)006:450: re bzhin bden gnyis zung 'jug gi tshul du rnam
NK045(bi)006:451: rtog sbyor bas sgom par byed pa'i tshe rang rgyud
NK045(bi)006:452: la ji snyed skyes pa'i sgom thams cad go rim
NK045(bi)006:453: bzhin du myur bar myur bar snga phyi sbrel te
NK045(bi)006:454: sgom par byed cing de dag kyang phan tshun gcig
NK045(bi)006:455: gi nang du kun 'dus pa'i tshul du sgom pas
NK045(bi)006:456: rnam rdzogs sbyor ba'i skabs su rang rgyud la skyes
NK045(bi)006:457: pa'i rtogs pa rnams brtan par byed pa'o //
NK045(bi)006:458: de yang mkhyen pa dang po'i sdug bden gyi rnam pa sgom pa'i skabs lta bu la mtshon na /
NK045(bi)006:459: dang po mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal sogs re
NK045(bi)006:460: re la dmigs bzung nas kun rdzob tu 'dus byas
NK045(bi)006:461: thams cad rtag pa med pa'i tshul la nges shes
NK045(bi)006:463: de yang don dam par na stong nyid du shes
NK045(bi)006:464: pas de la rlom pa'am zhen pa med pa gnyis
NK045(bi)006:465: po zung 'jug tu rgyud la skyes skyes su bsgom
NK045(bi)006:466: pa ni rnam rdzogs sbyor ba'i sgom yin la /
NK045(bi)006:467: de ltar rnam pa ci rigs rgyud la skyes pa'i
NK045(bi)006:468: skabs su mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa bdag med
NK045(bi)006:469: sogs go rim bzhin du bya rdzogs kyi skad cig
NK045(bi)006:470: skad cig gis rang rgyud la gsal 'debs pa'i tshul
NK045(bi)006:471: du yang yang byang bar byed cing /
NK045(bi)006:472: yang rnam pa gzhan gsum yang mi rtag pa kho na'i nang du bsdu ste /
NK045(bi)006:473: mi rtag pa nyid kyis na sdug bsngal ba'o zhes bshad pa'i phyir dang /
NK045(bi)006:474: 'dus byas rgyun gyi phreng ba yin pas na de
NK045(bi)006:475: kho nar stong pa dang bdag med pa yang yin
NK045(bi)006:476: pa sogs phan tshun re re'i nang du thams cad
NK045(bi)006:477: 'dus pa'i tshul la blo bzhag cing goms par byed
NK045(bi)006:478: pa'o // de yang gzhung las rim gyis pa ni
NK045(bi)006:479: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sogs bcu gsum por
NK045(bi)006:480: bshad pas mi rtag sogs rnam pa sgom pa rim
NK045(bi)006:481: gyis par ji ltar 'gyur snyam na /
NK045(bi)006:482: bcu gsum po ni rim gyis pa'i sgom pa'i yan lag yin gyi sgom dngos gzhi ma yin te /
NK045(bi)006:483: de yang dkon mchog gsum ni skyabs su 'gro ba
NK045(bi)006:484: lam thams cad kyi rten yin pas na rten dang
NK045(bi)006:485: / lha rjes su dran pa ni lam sgom pa'i dpang po dang /
NK045(bi)006:486: rnam pa re re bzhin yang pha rol tu phyin
NK045(bi)006:487: pa drug drug tshang zhing stong nyid kyi rtsis zin
NK045(bi)006:488: pa'i tshul du bsgom pas na phyi ma bdun po
NK045(bi)006:489: sgom tshul dang / gtong ba dang tshul khrims rjes
NK045(bi)006:490: su dran zhing de gnyis la gnas na tshe rabs
NK045(bi)006:491: thams cad du mtho ris kyi lus rten dang longs
NK045(bi)006:492: spyod phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo nas lam sgrub pa'i
NK045(bi)006:493: mthun rkyen tshang bar 'gyur bas na skye ba gzhan
NK045(bi)006:495: skye ba gzhan du yang goms par byed pa'i grogs su 'gyur ba'o //
NK045(bi)006:496: des na bsgom bya dngos ni /
NK045(bi)006:498: mtshan nyid de yi sbyor ba dang /
NK045(bi)006:499: de rab de yi go rim dang /
NK045(bi)006:500: zhes pa'i skabs su nges bzung gi de sgra thams
NK045(bi)006:501: cad mkhyen gsum gyi rnam pa la sbyar na yang
NK045(bi)006:502: rim gyis pa'i bsgom bya mkhyen gsum gyi rnam pa
NK045(bi)006:503: yin par 'gyur la phyi ma phyi ma'i de sgras
NK045(bi)006:504: snga ma snga ma ston par byas na yang /
NK045(bi)006:505: rnam rdzogs sbyor ba de rab tu gyur pa de
NK045(bi)006:506: nyid kyis go rim mthar gyis bar 'chad dgos pas
NK045(bi)006:507: gang ltar yang rnam rdzogs sbyor ba'i skabs kyi bsgom
NK045(bi)006:508: bya las logs na rim gyis pa'i bsgom bya med
NK045(bi)006:510: rnam rdzogs sbyor ba'i bsgom bya de las logs su
NK045(bi)006:511: rim gyis pa'i bsgom bya med na 'di mngon par
NK045(bi)006:512: rtog pa gnyis su ci'i phyir bzhag snyam na /
NK045(bi)006:513: 'di gnyis la gtso che chung sogs kyi khyad par yod de /
NK045(bi)006:514: rnam rdzogs sbyor ba ni gtso bo mkhyen gsum gyi
NK045(bi)006:515: rnam pas mtshon pa'i chos thams cad stong nyid spros
NK045(bi)006:516: bral du bsgom pa yin la /
NK045(bi)006:517: rim gyis pa ni gtso bor snying rje chen pos
NK045(bi)006:518: kun nas bslangs te rnam pa thams cad pa'i ting
NK045(bi)006:519: nge 'dzin gyi rtsal sbyang ba yin pa dang /
NK045(bi)006:520: gzhan yang rnam rdzogs sbyor ba ni mnyam bzhag dang /
NK045(bi)006:521: rim gyis pa ni rjes thob kyi sgom pa gtso che ba yin no //
NK045(bi)006:522: de yang sbyor ba 'di gnyis mnyam rjes su gsungs pa'i don /
NK045(bi)006:523: da lta sems ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa'i gnas skabs la mnyam bzhag dang /
NK045(bi)006:524: de las langs nas spyod lam byed pa'i gnas skabs
NK045(bi)006:525: la rjes thob tu bzhag pa de ni ma yin
NK045(bi)006:526: te / 'phags pa sa thob pa rnams kyi rnam
NK045(bi)006:527: par mi rtog pa'i ye shes mtshan ma dang bral
NK045(bi)006:528: ba'i dbyings la mnyam par 'jog pa ni mnyam bzhag
NK045(bi)006:529: te / dang / de'i rjes su rnam pa thams
NK045(bi)006:530: cad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rtsal sbyong ba la
NK045(bi)006:531: rjes thob tu bzhag pa yin no //
NK045(bi)006:532: de yang da lta las dang po bas sgom pa'i
NK045(bi)006:533: dus su rnam rdzogs sgom pa'i tshe yang mi rtag
NK045(bi)006:534: pa la sogs blo ngor snang zhing de nyid stong
NK045(bi)006:535: par gtan la phab nas sgom pa dang /
NK045(bi)006:536: rim gyis pa'i skabs su yang stong pa dang ma
NK045(bi)006:537: bral ba'i ngang nas rnam pa rnams go rim bzhin
NK045(bi)006:538: du gsal btab nas byang bar byed pa yin pas
NK045(bi)006:539: sgom tshul rnam pa re re nas sgom pa dang
NK045(bi)006:540: mang po sbrel te sgrom pa'i khyad par dang /
NK045(bi)006:541: stong pa dang rnam pa gtso che chung gi khyad
NK045(bi)006:542: par tsam ma gtogs mnyam rjes kyi khyad par med
NK045(bi)006:544: 'phags lam thob nas rnam rdzogs sgom pa na /
NK045(bi)006:545: rnam pa re re nas stong nyid du gtan la phab nas skye med du sgom ma dgos par /
NK045(bi)006:546: yul dang yul can gnyis snang gi rtog pa thams
NK045(bi)006:547: cad lan tsh+wa chu la thim pa ltar rnam par
NK045(bi)006:548: mi rtog pa'i ye shes gcig gi klong du dag
NK045(bi)006:549: ste blo'i spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i don
NK045(bi)006:550: dam mngon du gyur pas na mnyam bzhag dang /
NK045(bi)006:551: 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams ni dper na sdong po
NK045(bi)006:552: bkod pa'i mdo las nor bzang gi dge ba'i bshes
NK045(bi)006:553: gnyen rnams kyis rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyi
NK045(bi)006:554: rnam par thar pa'i mthu dag bstan pa bzhin du
NK045(bi)006:555: sbyin sogs rgyal sras kyi spyod pa rlabs po che
NK045(bi)006:556: rnams kyang ting nge 'dzin kho na'i stobs kyis sgrub
NK045(bi)006:557: par byed pas na rim gyis pa'i sgom la brten
NK045(bi)006:558: nas rnam pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon
NK045(bi)006:559: du byed pa rjes thob tu bzhag pa yin no
NK045(bi)006:560: // de yang 'phags pa'i mnyam bzhag spros pa thams
NK045(bi)006:561: cad nye bar zhi ba yin pas rnam pa tha
NK045(bi)006:562: dad du sgom pa med kyang rnam pa gtan med
NK045(bi)006:564: dper na mthong lam rtse mo'i skabs su /
NK045(bi)006:565: sbyin pa la sogs re rer ni /
NK045(bi)006:566: de dag phan tshun bsdus pa gang /
NK045(bi)006:567: skad cig gcig pa'i bzod pa yis /
NK045(bi)006:568: bsdus pa de 'dir mthong ba'i lam /
NK045(bi)006:569: zhes pa'i skabs su pha rol tu phyin pa drug
NK045(bi)006:570: drug sum cu rtsa drug gi rang bzhin mthong lam
NK045(bi)006:571: yin par bshad pa bzhin mkhyen pa gsum gyi rnam
NK045(bi)006:572: pa ji snyed pa rnams kyang mnyam bzhag rnam par
NK045(bi)006:573: mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngang du spros pa
NK045(bi)006:574: nye bar zhi ba'i tshul du rdzogs pa yin te
NK045(bi)006:575: des na rnam kun mngon rdzogs byang chub pa rdzogs
NK045(bi)006:576: pa chen po zhes pa dang don gcig pa /
NK045(bi)006:577: zhes pa'i ming gi don yang grub pa yin no //
NK045(bi)006:578: ma dag pa'i sa bdun du rjes thob rgyal sras
NK045(bi)006:579: kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad te rnam par
NK045(bi)006:580: thams cad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la brten nas sgrub
NK045(bi)006:581: pa yin yang mtshan ma dang bral ba'i dbyings su
NK045(bi)006:582: ro gcig pa'i tshul gyis sgom mi nus shing bdun
NK045(bi)006:583: pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin
NK045(bi)006:584: tsam yod kyang de yang 'bad rtsol dang bcas pa
NK045(bi)006:585: yin pas rnam rdzogs dang rim gyis pa'i sgom pa
NK045(bi)006:587: sa brgyad pa yan chad du rnam kun mchog ldan
NK045(bi)006:588: gyi stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la brten
NK045(bi)006:589: nas zag pa med pa'i dbyings su de bzhi gshegs
NK045(bi)006:590: pa'i yon tan thams cad pa dang /
NK045(bi)006:592: bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams rim pa bzhin thob
NK045(bi)006:593: pas mtshan med 'bad rtsol dang bral ba'i lam la
NK045(bi)006:594: brten nas rang bzhin gyi don gnyis lhun gyis grub
NK045(bi)006:595: cing srid zhi mnyam nyid kyi sbyor ba la slob
NK045(bi)006:596: pa'i skabs yin pas rnam rdzogs dang rim gyis pa'i
NK045(bi)006:597: sgom gnyis dbyer med du 'dre ba'i mgo tshugs shing
NK045(bi)006:598: rgyun mtha'i bar chad med lam du zag pa dbyings
NK045(bi)006:599: su rnam par dag pa'i mchog gi yon tan mthar
NK045(bi)006:600: thug ste bden gnyis tha dad du 'dzin pa'i rgol
NK045(bi)006:601: ba bcu drug lhag ma med par spangs nas mnyam
NK045(bi)006:602: rjes rnam rdzogs dang rim bsgom gnyis dbyer med par
NK045(bi)006:603: gyur cing shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin cha mnyam
NK045(bi)006:604: ste skad cig ma'i ye shes mngon du gyur pa
NK045(bi)006:605: yin no // gzhan yang bskal bzang dang ting nge
NK045(bi)006:606: 'dzin rgyal po la sogs pa mdo mang po zhig
NK045(bi)006:607: tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo mang po
NK045(bi)006:608: zhig bgrangs nas de dag mnyam pa nyid rnam par
NK045(bi)006:609: spros pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin du gsungs
NK045(bi)006:610: pa rnams kyang mthar gyis pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i
NK045(bi)006:612: 'di gnyis bsgom pa'i dgos pa yang chos thams cad
NK045(bi)006:613: stong pa nyid du sgom pa'i rnam rdzogs sgom pa
NK045(bi)006:614: med na sgrib gnyis bag chags dang bcas pa spangs
NK045(bi)006:615: shing chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid khong du chud
NK045(bi)006:616: pa'i sangs rgyas nyid mi thob la /
NK045(bi)006:617: rjes thob shes bya thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i
NK045(bi)006:618: mthar gyis pa'i sgom pa med na zag med kyi
NK045(bi)006:619: chos gcig mngon du byas pas chos thams cad mngon
NK045(bi)006:620: du 'gyur ba'i rnam mkhyen nyid mi thob par gsungs
NK045(bi)006:622: glo bur nyon mongs dag pa ni //
NK045(bi)006:623: mdor na mi rtog ye shes kyi //
NK045(bi)006:624: 'bras bu yin pa rab tu brjod //
NK045(bi)006:625: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i //
NK045(bi)006:626: chos kyi sku ni nges thob pa //
NK045(bi)006:627: de ni rjes las thob pa yi //
NK045(bi)006:628: ye shes 'bras bu yin par bstan //
NK045(bi)006:629: zhes pa dang don gcig go //
NK045(bi)006:630: mdor na mthar thug sangs rgyas kyi sku gnyis thob
NK045(bi)006:631: pa'i rgyu theg chen lam gyi nyams len mthar thug
NK045(bi)006:632: pa ni 'di gnyis po yin pas 'di'i khongs su
NK045(bi)006:641: chos sku dang gzugs sku la sogs mang po zhig /
NK045(bi)006:642: kha cig ngo bo gcig pa dang /
NK045(bi)006:643: kha cig phyogs mtshungs pa dang /
NK045(bi)006:644: kha cig shas che chung dang /
NK045(bi)006:645: kha cig rgyu 'bras su 'gyur ba'i tshul rnams la'ang dpyad par bya'o //
NK045(bi)006:646: de yang tshogs sbyor du ni rang rgyud bden zhen
NK045(bi)006:647: gyis bcing zhing las nyon gyi 'ching ba las ma
NK045(bi)006:648: grol ba'i phyir stong nyid rnam rdzogs gtso bor bsgom
NK045(bi)006:649: dgos la / sa thob nas ni gzhan don gtso
NK045(bi)006:650: bor bya zhing rnam mkhyen gyi ye shes kyi rgyur
NK045(bi)006:651: rim sgoom gtso bor bya dgos pas /
NK045(bi)006:652: rtse mo thob nas mthar gyis pa sgom par gsungs pa dang /
NK045(bi)006:653: de rab de yi go rim dang //
NK045(bi)006:654: zhes pa'i don yang de ltar 'grel du rung ngo //
NK045(bi)006:655: des na kha cig nam mkha' ltar spros bral blo
NK045(bi)006:656: las 'das pa'i stong nyid zab mo ston pa rnams
NK045(bi)006:657: 'phags pa sogs gang zag mchog gi chos yin zhing
NK045(bi)006:658: / 'khor lo tha ma'i mdo dang de'i dgongs 'grel
NK045(bi)006:659: rnams lta bu spyod phyogs ston pa rnams las dang
NK045(bi)006:660: po'i chos yin smra ba rnams ni rgyal ba sras
NK045(bi)006:661: bcas kyi ring lugs las go logs su smra bar
NK045(bi)006:662: / zad de / dper na bu ram mur bzhin
NK045(bi)006:663: pa'i gang zag la bu ram gyi ro 'chad kyang
NK045(bi)006:665: mdang sum btsas pa'i byis pa la g.yos su byas
NK045(bi)006:666: pa'i zas sna mang po'i ston mo bshams kyang ci
NK045(bi)006:668: dpe de bzhin du zab mo mngon du byas pa'i
NK045(bi)006:669: 'phags pa la zab don 'chad kyang ci zhig dgos
NK045(bi)006:670: la / mthong lam chos nyid ma mthong zhing sgom
NK045(bi)006:671: lam ting 'dzin ma goms pa'i gang zag gis bsam
NK045(bi)006:672: gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam thar thob pa'i byang chub
NK045(bi)006:673: sems dpa'i spyod pa rlabs po che lta ci theg
NK045(bi)006:674: chen lam gyi phyin drug mtshan nyid pa tsam yang
NK045(bi)006:676: sbyin pa mi mthun phyogs nyams dang //
NK045(bi)006:677: rnam par mi rtog ye shes ldan //
NK045(bi)006:678: 'dod pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed //
NK045(bi)006:679: sems can rnam smin byed rnam gsum //
NK045(bi)006:680: zhes sogs phyin drug gi mtshan nyid gsungs pa la brtags pas kyang shes par 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)006:681: yang kha cig stong nyid rtogs nas spyod pa rlabs
NK045(bi)006:682: po che la slob mi dgos zhes smra ba yang
NK045(bi)006:683: rdzun gyis mgo skor smra ba yin te /
NK045(bi)006:684: stong nyid rtogs pa kho nas spyod pa la slob
NK045(bi)006:685: pa yin gyis stong nyid ma rtogs pas spyod pa
NK045(bi)006:687: byis pa mal nas ldang mi nus pas ltad mo pa'i gseb tu gar byed par 'gyur ram ci /
NK045(bi)006:688: stong nyid rtogs nas spyod pa ci zhig bya ste
NK045(bi)006:689: spyod pa sbyin sogs ni stong nyid rtogs pa'i ched
NK045(bi)006:691: theg chen lam gyi spyi don cung zad kyang khong
NK045(bi)006:692: du ma chud cing dman lam la theg chen du
NK045(bi)006:695: gzhung gi mchod brjod kyi skabs su /
NK045(bi)006:696: 'gro la phan par byed rnams lam shes nyid kyis
NK045(bi)006:697: 'jig rten don sgrub mdzad pa gang zhes gsungs pa
NK045(bi)006:698: ltar / rgyal sras rnams kyi bzhed pa'i don mthar
NK045(bi)006:699: thug pa ni gzhan don yin pas sbyin sogs spyod
NK045(bi)006:700: pa rgya mtsho'i thabs la brten nas mtha' yas pa'i
NK045(bi)006:701: sems can gyi 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed
NK045(bi)006:702: pa ni theg chen lam gyi dngos gzhi yin la
NK045(bi)006:703: de'i sngon du stong nyid mngon sum du rtogs pa
NK045(bi)006:704: med na bdag gzhan mnyam pa nyid khong du mi
NK045(bi)006:705: chud pas spyod pa rnam par dag par mi 'gyur
NK045(bi)006:706: bas na stong nyid mngon du byed pa ni rgyal
NK045(bi)006:707: ba'i sras kyi spyod pa rlabs po che'i sngon du
NK045(bi)006:708: 'gro ba yin gyi theg chen lam gyis gtso bor
NK045(bi)006:709: mthar thug gi gnyer bya ga la yin te /
NK045(bi)006:711: chos nyid rab tu rtogs nas 'dir //
NK045(bi)006:712: lhag pa'i tshul khrims lhag sems dang //
NK045(bi)006:713: lhag pa'i shes rab la rjes slob //
NK045(bi)006:715: byang chub sems dpa'i dbye ba'i skabs su'ang /
NK045(bi)006:716: ma dag sa bdun skabs su spyod pa la gnas pa zhes bshad pa bzhin no //
NK045(bi)006:717: yang spyod pa ni rgyud spyod pa la dgos kyis theg chen lam gyi mthar thug ma yin te /
NK045(bi)006:718: mdo sde dag las bcom ldan 'das kyis /
NK045(bi)006:719: ji srid sa brgyad pa ma thob par sangs rgyas
NK045(bi)006:720: rnams kyis nga lung ma bstan te spyod pa la
NK045(bi)006:722: sa brgyad pa thob nas spyod pa thams cad las
NK045(bi)006:723: yang dag par 'das pas lung bstan par gsungs pa'i
NK045(bi)006:724: phyir snyam na / de'i don ni /
NK045(bi)006:725: gong du bshad pa ltar sa bdun pa man chad
NK045(bi)006:726: du mtshan med 'bad rtsol dang bral ba'i lam med
NK045(bi)006:727: pas rnam par mi rtog pa dang gzhan don gyi
NK045(bi)006:728: spyod pa zung du ma chud pas spyod pa la
NK045(bi)006:729: bden zhen gyi cha phra mo yod pas spyod pa
NK045(bi)006:731: sa brgyad pa thob nas mtshan med 'bad rtsol dang
NK045(bi)006:732: bral ba mngon du gyur pas spyod pa la zhen
NK045(bi)006:733: pa phra mo'ang bral zhing lhun gyis grub par 'byung
NK045(bi)006:734: ba la spyod pa las 'das zhes gsungs pa yin
NK045(bi)006:735: mod / 'di'i skabs su rnam par mi rtog pa
NK045(bi)006:736: zhi ba'i dbyings su zhugs na chad pa'i myang 'das
NK045(bi)006:737: su 'gyur gyis dogs nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang
NK045(bi)006:738: yang gzhan don la bskul bar gsungs te spyod pa
NK045(bi)006:739: lam gyi mthar thug ma yin na bskul yang ci
NK045(bi)006:740: mod / zhig dgos / yang sbyin sogs kyi spyod
NK045(bi)006:741: pa stong nyid rtogs pa'i ched du slob pa min
NK045(bi)006:742: mod / zhig dgos / na / spyod 'jug las /
NK045(bi)006:743: yan lag 'di dag thams cad ni //
NK045(bi)006:744: thub pas shes rab don du gsungs //
NK045(bi)006:745: zhes gsungs pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur zhe na /
NK045(bi)006:746: 'di'i skabs kyi shes rab ni slob dpon phyogs glang gis /
NK045(bi)006:747: shes rab pha rol phyin gnyis med //
NK045(bi)006:748: ye shes de ni de bzhin gshegs //
NK045(bi)006:749: zhes gsungs pa ltar sangs rgyas kyi gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yin te /
NK045(bi)006:750: sher le'i gzhung gi shes rab kyi ngo bo ngos 'dzin pa'i skabs su /
NK045(bi)006:751: gang tshe dngos dang dngos med dag /
NK045(bi)006:752: blo yi mdun na mi gnas pa //
NK045(bi)006:753: de tshe rnam pa gzhan med pas //
NK045(bi)006:754: dmigs pa med pa rab tu zhi //
NK045(bi)006:755: zhes shes rab spros pa dang bral ba'i dbyings ngos bzung nas /
NK045(bi)006:756: de ltar na gzhan don gzugs sku mi 'byung bar thal ba'i rtsod spong de ma thag tu /
NK045(bi)006:757: yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing //
NK045(bi)006:758: ji ltar re ba yongs skong ba //
NK045(bi)006:759: de bzhin gdul byar smon lam gyi //
NK045(bi)006:760: dbang gis rgyal ba'i skur snang ngo //
NK045(bi)006:762: de lta na'ang theg chen lam gyi gtso bo bdag med rtogs pa'i shes rab yin par 'gyur te /
NK045(bi)006:763: theg chen lam gyis gnyer bya ni sgrib gnyis spangs pa'i sangs rgyas yin la /
NK045(bi)006:764: de ni shes rab zab mos mngon du byed dgos so zhe na /
NK045(bi)006:765: ci khyod da dung yang dman lam la theg chen
NK045(bi)006:766: du zhen pa'i rtog ngan de kho na mi spang
NK045(bi)006:768: theg chen lam gyi gnyer bya ni sgrib gnyis spangs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin te /
NK045(bi)006:770: gang dang yang dag ldan pas thub rnams rnam pa kun ldan sna tshogs 'di gsungs pa /
NK045(bi)006:771: zhes pa'i skabs su gang zag sangs rgyas kyis /
NK045(bi)006:772: thabs rnam mkhyen la brten nas /
NK045(bi)006:773: 'bras bu chos 'khor bskor ba zhes bshad pas /
NK045(bi)006:774: mthar thug gi gnyer bya sangs rgyas yin na /
NK045(bi)006:775: de la yang 'bras bu ci zhig dgos /
NK045(bi)006:776: des na gnas skabs dang mthar thug gnyis kar yang
NK045(bi)006:777: theg chen lam gyis gnyer bya'i gtso bo gzhan don
NK045(bi)006:778: yin la / de bsgrub pa'i thabs dngos ni lam
NK045(bi)006:779: gyi gnas skabs su sbyin sogs byang chub kyi spyod
NK045(bi)006:780: yin la / pa dang / 'bras bu'i skabs su sangs rgyas nyid kyi phrin las yin zhing /
NK045(bi)006:782: 'grub byed kyi rgyu'i gtso bo ni shes rab yin
NK045(bi)006:783: pas shes rab mchog dang gtso bor bshad pa yin
NK045(bi)006:785: sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba shes rab ste //
NK045(bi)006:786: tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus de bzhin de /
NK045(bi)006:787: dge chos cud mi gsan phyir yongs su 'dzin pa yin //
NK045(bi)006:789: dmus long dmigs bu med pa bye ba khrag khrig rnams //
NK045(bi)006:790: lam yang mi shes grong khyer 'jug par ga la 'gyur //
NK045(bi)006:791: shes rab med na mig med pha rol phyin lnga yang //
NK045(bi)006:792: dmigs bu med pas byang chub reg par 'gyur ma yin //
NK045(bi)006:794: shes rab ni dmus long gi sna khrid lta bur sngon du 'gro bar gsungs pas /
NK045(bi)006:795: dang por rnam par mi rtag pa'i ye shes stong
NK045(bi)006:796: nyid kyi rtogs pa rang rgyud la bskyed nas gzod
NK045(bi)006:797: sbyin sogs rgyal sras kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho'i sgo
NK045(bi)006:798: nas bskal pa grangs med par gzhan phan gyi spyod
NK045(bi)006:799: pa lhur blangs te rdzogs smin sbyangs nas yang dag
NK045(bi)006:800: mtha' mngon du byed pa ni lam gyi 'brel ma
NK045(bi)006:802: yang phyin drug gi go rim 'chad pa'i skabs su /
NK045(bi)006:803: longs spyod la mi lta na tshul khrims srung ngo //
NK045(bi)006:804: tshul khrims bsrung na bzod do //
NK045(bi)006:805: zhes snga phyi rgyu 'bras su gsungs pa dang /
NK045(bi)006:806: gang phyir sbyin pas longs spyod dag ni sgrub byed la //
NK045(bi)006:807: khrims kyis mtho ris bsgoms pas nyon mongs spong byed cing //
NK045(bi)006:808: shes rab nyon mongs shes bya kun spong de yi phyir //
NK045(bi)006:809: 'di mchog nyid de de yi rgyu ni 'di thos yin //
NK045(bi)006:810: zhes sogs mchog dman gyi khyad par gsungs pa rnams
NK045(bi)006:811: ni so skyes sa'i sbyin sogs dgongs shing gong gi
NK045(bi)006:812: spyod 'jug gi lung don yang 'di ltar bkral na'ang
NK045(bi)006:813: rung ngo // de nyid kyi phyir tshogs sbyor du
NK045(bi)006:814: sbyin sogs rang rgyud sbyong ba'i tshogs bsags la slob
NK045(bi)006:815: pa ni zab mo lta ba rang rgyud la skye
NK045(bi)006:816: ba'i rgyu tsam yin gyi rgyal sras byang chub sems
NK045(bi)006:817: dpa'i rgya chen spyod pa'i nyams len yang ma yin
NK045(bi)006:818: la de dag phyin drug mtshan nyid pa'ang ma yin
NK045(bi)006:819: rung ngo // te / de dag ni rnam par
NK045(bi)006:820: mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yang ma
NK045(bi)006:821: rung ngo // te / yin zhing / mi mthun phyogs nyams pa'ang ma yin /
NK045(bi)006:822: de la brten nas sems can rnams kyi 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs pa'ang ma yin /
NK045(bi)006:823: skal ba bzhin du byang chub gsum gang rung la
NK045(bi)006:824: 'god pa'ang ma yin pas mtshan nyid bzhi'i gcig kyang
NK045(bi)006:825: ma tshang zhing gzhan yang yon tan bzhi sgrub pa
NK045(bi)006:826: dang chags pa bdun spang ba sogs med pas de
NK045(bi)006:827: dag la pha rol phyin don med de /
NK045(bi)006:828: dper na nyan rang gi mi sdug pa bsgom pa
NK045(bi)006:829: theg chen gyi bsam gtan phar phyin ma yin pa
NK045(bi)006:830: bzhin no // de dag kyang skyes bu mkhas pa
NK045(bi)006:831: dag gi dpes bstan na rtogs par 'gyur bas dpe
NK045(bi)006:833: dper na sman pa mkhas pas sems can gyi nad
NK045(bi)006:834: zhi bar byed pa'i phyir rin po che dngul chu'i
NK045(bi)006:835: sbyor bar byed pa'i tshe dang por phyi ba dang
NK045(bi)006:837: btso ba'i sgo nas dngul chu nyid dag par byas te /
NK045(bi)006:838: dug dang bral bar gyur nas sman sna tshogs dang
NK045(bi)006:839: sbyar te sems can gyi nad mi 'dra ba kun
NK045(bi)006:841: dpe de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang /
NK045(bi)006:842: srid zhi'i rgud pa ma lus pa sel ba'i rgyu
NK045(bi)006:843: gcig pu rin chen byang chub kyi sems rang rgyud
NK045(bi)006:844: la bskyed par byed de de yang so skye'i sar
NK045(bi)006:845: rang 'dod kyi dug dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir
NK045(bi)006:846: zab mo stong pa nyid la goms par byed cing
NK045(bi)006:847: mthong lam chos nyid mngon du byas pas chos mnyam
NK045(bi)006:848: pa nyid khong du chud de rang 'dod kyi dri
NK045(bi)006:849: ma kun dang bral nas dag par gyur pa na
NK045(bi)006:850: rgyal sras kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho kun kyang 'khor
NK045(bi)006:851: gsum rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshul dang sbyar te
NK045(bi)006:852: rang don yal bar 'dor ba'i brtson 'grus rmad du
NK045(bi)006:853: byung ba'i sgo nas sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs
NK045(bi)006:854: pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i nad ma lus pa
NK045(bi)006:855: gso bar byed pa yin la /
NK045(bi)006:856: gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal pos zhus pa'i mdo lung
NK045(bi)006:857: nor bu sbyong ba'i dpes gsungs pa yang lam gyi
NK045(bi)006:858: go rim 'di nyid kho na bstan pa yin te
NK045(bi)006:859: / de las snga ma gnyis ni go bar sla
NK045(bi)006:860: la phyi ma'i skabs kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor
NK045(bi)006:861: lo'i gtam ni thabs snying rje chen po dang /
NK045(bi)006:862: shes rab stong pa nyid zung du 'jug pa'i lam
NK045(bi)006:863: yin par mdo btus 'grel pa sogs las bshad cing
NK045(bi)006:864: / 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ni sbyin sogs
NK045(bi)006:865: rgyal sras kyi spyod pa rnams yin te 'khor gsum
NK045(bi)006:866: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nyams su len pa'i phyir
NK045(bi)006:867: / ro // de'ang 'phags mchog klu grub zhabs kyis
NK045(bi)006:868: mdo btus su lung 'di nyid dwangs nas mthar thug
NK045(bi)006:869: theg pa gcig tu sgrub par mdzad de /
NK045(bi)006:870: dang por mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal sogs kyis 'khor ba la skyo ba bskyed nas /
NK045(bi)006:871: gzod zab pa dang rgya che ba'i theg chen la
NK045(bi)006:872: 'jug par gsungs pas nyan rang gi lam theg chen
NK045(bi)006:873: gyi rkang stegs tsam yin par bsgrub bo //
NK045(bi)006:874: rgyal sras thogs med zhabs ni rgyud bla'i 'grel par
NK045(bi)006:875: lung 'di nyid drangs nas byang chub sems dpa'i rgyud
NK045(bi)006:876: 'di ltar rim pa bzhin sbyong ba gsungs pas na
NK045(bi)006:877: sbyang bya snying po'i khams rnam par dag pa yod
NK045(bi)006:878: par grub bo zhes de bzhin gshegs pa'i khams sgrub
NK045(bi)006:880: de gnyis gang ltar yang 'dra ste skabs dang por mi rtag sdug bsngal sogs blo sbyang /
NK045(bi)006:881: skabs gnyis par rnam thar sgo gsum gyi gtam la
NK045(bi)006:882: brten nas zab mo lta ba'i chos nyid mngon sum
NK045(bi)006:883: du byas / skabs gsum par phyir mi ldog pa 'khor lo'i gtam dang /
NK045(bi)006:884: 'khor gsum rnam par dag pa'i gtam la brten nas
NK045(bi)006:885: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rlabs po che la
NK045(bi)006:886: slob pa'i lam gyi go rim 'di kho na ltar
NK045(bi)006:887: shing rta'i srol 'byed gnyis ka bzhed pas na 'dzam
NK045(bi)006:888: gling rgyan mchog gnyis kyi gzhung dri ma med pa
NK045(bi)006:889: rnams kyang 'gal ba med par zung du bsdebs te
NK045(bi)006:890: gang zag gcig gi nyams len du hril gyis 'dril
NK045(bi)006:891: shes na mkhas pa zhes bya'i /
NK045(bi)006:892: phyogs 'dzin pa'i chags sdang gis rtsod pa la sgrim
NK045(bi)006:893: pas ni chos spong gi las tshab po che sogs
NK045(bi)006:894: par 'gyur gyi thos pas rgyud grol bar mi 'gyur
NK045(bi)006:895: ro // mdor na theg chen lam gyis gnyer bya'i
NK045(bi)006:896: gtso bo ni nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sems can
NK045(bi)006:897: thams cad rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang bla
NK045(bi)006:898: na med la 'god pa'i sangs rgyas kyi phrin las
NK045(bi)006:899: yin pas na rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams
NK045(bi)006:900: kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni mi zad cing mtha'
NK045(bi)006:901: gtugs pa med pa yin te /
NK045(bi)006:903: nam mkha'i mthar thug gyur pa ci tsam par //
NK045(bi)006:904: sems can ma lus mtha' yang de bzhin de //
NK045(bi)006:905: ci tsam las dang nyon mongs mthar gyur pa //
NK045(bi)006:906: bdag gi smon lam mtha' yang de tsam mo //
NK045(bi)006:908: de ltar ma yin par theg chen lam gyis gnyer
NK045(bi)006:909: bya gnas skabs zab mo stong pa nyid kyi don
NK045(bi)006:911: mthar thug rang rgyud sgrib gnyis kyi 'ching ba las
NK045(bi)006:912: grol ba'i sangs rgyas thob pa tsam yin na ni
NK045(bi)006:913: rgyal sras rnams kyi dge rtsa yang de nyid du
NK045(bi)006:915: dper na dman pa'i lam du lhag med myang 'das thob pa bzhin no //
NK045(bi)006:916: 'di ltar bshad pa rnams kyang dam pa'i skyes bu
NK045(bi)006:917: rnams la ni grub zin pa nyid yang sgrub par
NK045(bi)006:919: rang dang skal ba mnyam pa'i blo dman 'ga' zhig
NK045(bi)006:920: dang po sems bskyed kyi skabs su sangs rgyas kyi
NK045(bi)006:921: yon tan mthong nas sems bskyed pa dang /
NK045(bi)006:922: theg pa mchog dman du bltas nas sangs rgyas kyi
NK045(bi)006:923: sar smon pa lta bu mdor na rtsa ba snying
NK045(bi)006:924: rje las ma skyes pa'i sems bskyed gzhan dag theg
NK045(bi)006:925: chen sems bskyed yin par rloms pa dang /
NK045(bi)006:926: lam gyi skabs su stong nyid rtogs nas sbyin sogs la gtan nas slob mi dgos snyam pa dang /
NK045(bi)006:927: mthong zin goms par byed pa sgom lam zhes pa'i
NK045(bi)006:928: tshig tsam la 'khrul nas mthong lam thob nas bzung
NK045(bi)006:929: ste rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes de nyid
NK045(bi)006:930: la goms par byed pa kho nas 'tshang rgya ba
NK045(bi)006:932: theg pa che chung gi khyad par byang chub sems
NK045(bi)006:933: dpa'i sems bskyed dang spyod pas 'byed pa yin par
NK045(bi)006:934: mi shes par lta ba stong nyid kho nas 'byed
NK045(bi)006:936: gzhan phan gyi bsam sbyor ci yang med pa'i lha
NK045(bi)006:937: sgom gyi chos skad zab mdog kha ba re'i sgo
NK045(bi)006:938: nas theg chen yin no snyam pa dang /
NK045(bi)006:939: zab mo lta ba dang rgya chen spyod pa'i ring
NK045(bi)006:940: lugs dri ma med pa gnyis kyang me dang chu
NK045(bi)006:942: rgyal ba'i bka' 'khor lo bar tha gnyis kyang gang
NK045(bi)006:943: rung re re phyogs 'dzin gyis bzung nas de kho
NK045(bi)006:944: nas chog par rlom pa'i ya bral du lta ba
NK045(bi)006:945: rnams la cung zad phan par 'gyur ram snyam nas
NK045(bi)006:946: don gcig yang yang bshad pa'i zlos skyon byung song
NK045(bi)006:947: rung de la ma 'dzem par smras pa yin la
NK045(bi)006:948: / gzhan yang phyi rabs su theg pa chen po'i
NK045(bi)006:949: gzhung lam ma nor ba la slob par 'dod pa'i
NK045(bi)006:950: skal bzang rnams so skye'i sar yang dang po byang
NK045(bi)006:951: chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa sogs las
NK045(bi)006:952: dang po pa'i blo sbyong dang lam rim la brten
NK045(bi)006:953: nas rang rgyud lpags dang mda' bzhin du gyong 'kheng
NK045(bi)006:954: dang bral bar brdung zhing drang por bsrangs te /
NK045(bi)006:955: de'i rjes su dpal mgon 'phags pa klu sgrub zhabs
NK045(bi)006:956: kyi dbu ma rtsa ba la sogs pa'i gzhung la
NK045(bi)006:957: brten nas zab mo lta ba'i don la mthar 'dzin
NK045(bi)006:958: gyi sgro 'dogs bcad de bden par zhen pa'i dmigs
NK045(bi)006:959: yul phra mo tsam yang sun phyungs nas spros bral
NK045(bi)006:960: gyi lta ba gtan la phab /
NK045(bi)006:961: da dung de tsam gyis chog shes mi byed pa
NK045(bi)006:962: zab mo 'khor lo tha ma'i gsung rab zab mo
NK045(bi)006:963: rnams dang rgyal tshab rjes 'brangs dang bcas pa'i gzhung
NK045(bi)006:964: lugs dri ma med pa rnams la brtags nas kun
NK045(bi)006:965: tu bzang po'i spyod pa bla na med pa la
NK045(bi)006:967: pags rlon me nang du bcug pa ltar tshe gcig
NK045(bi)006:968: tsam gyis blo sna thung 'ub 'ub mi byed par
NK045(bi)006:969: / nam mkha'i mtha' dang sems can gyi mtha' la
NK045(bi)006:970: tshad btsugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar
NK045(bi)006:971: pa'i sgo la brten nas mdzad pa nam mkha' dang
NK045(bi)006:972: mnyam pa'i rgyal ba'i sras kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho
NK045(bi)006:973: lta bu blo'i ra ba las 'das pa rnams kyang
NK045(bi)006:974: thos pa'i lam du bzhag nas /
NK045(bi)006:976: spyod pa dag ni tshad yod ma gyur cig /
NK045(bi)006:977: yon tan rnams kyang tshad bzung med par shog /
NK045(bi)006:978: spyod pa tshad med pa la gnas nas kyang //
NK045(bi)006:979: de dag 'phrul pa thams cad 'tshal bar bgyi //
NK045(bi)006:980: zhes pa ltar zab pa dang rgya che ba rgyal
NK045(bi)006:981: ba'i yum gyi gzhung lam 'di nyid kyis khog phub
NK045(bi)006:982: pa'i khongs su rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras kyi ring
NK045(bi)006:983: lugs dri ma med pa thams cad la mtha' gcig
NK045(bi)006:984: tu 'dun zhing smon pas yul du gyur na ci
NK045(bi)006:985: ma rung snyam pa yang yin no //
NK045(bi)006:986: zab cing rgya che theg pa chen po'i lam //
NK045(bi)006:987: zab cing rgya che mi 'gal bsdu ba'i gnad //
NK045(bi)006:988: zab dang rgya che'i tshul 'di sus rtogs pa //
NK045(bi)006:989: de dag rgyal ba'i yum 'dis rjes su 'dzin //
NK045(bi)006:990: de ltar bsam pa dang sbyor ba khyad par can
NK045(bi)006:991: gyi sgo nas lam nyams su blangs pa'i 'bras bu
NK045(bi)006:992: ni / chos sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa yin te gzhung las shes par 'gyur ro //
NK045(bi)006:993: de'ang spyir rgyal sras rnams thog ma'i kun slong gis
NK045(bi)006:994: gnyer bya gang yin pa de nyid tha ma'i 'bras
NK045(bi)006:995: bu yin pas 'khor ba ma stong bar du rtag
NK045(bi)006:996: khyab lhun 'grub chen po'i 'gro don gyis gzhan phan
NK045(bi)006:997: mdzad pa ni byang sems lam gyis bsgrub bya dngos
NK045(bi)006:998: yin la de'i rten ni chos kyi sku yin zhing
NK045(bi)006:999: / chos sku de la yang spang rtogs kyi cha gnyis las /
NK045(bi)006:1000: phrin las gzhan phan mdzad pa'i bdag rkyen dngos ni
NK045(bi)006:1001: rtogs pa ye shes kyi chos sku yin pas na
NK045(bi)006:1003: chos sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa /
NK045(bi)006:1006: chos sku phrin las 'bras bu ni //
NK045(bi)006:1008: de ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
NK045(bi)006:1009: mngon du mdzad pa ni sgrib gnyis bag chags dang
NK045(bi)006:1010: bcas pa spangs pa'i lag rjes yin mod kyang /
NK045(bi)006:1011: dman lam du'ang nyan rang dgra bcom lhag med du
NK045(bi)006:1012: zhugs pa na sgrib pa gnyis ka rten med pa'i
NK045(bi)006:1013: sgo nas spang bar 'dod pas theg pa che chung
NK045(bi)006:1014: gi 'bras bu'i khyad par spang ba'i sgo nas mi
NK045(bi)006:1015: 'byed kyi / rtogs pa ye shes chos sku mdzad
NK045(bi)006:1016: pa dang bcas pa'i sgo nas 'byed par gsungs pa'i
NK045(bi)006:1017: 'byed kyi / phyir dang / theg chen sems bskyed
NK045(bi)006:1018: kyis thog ma'i kun slong ma nor bar ngos zin
NK045(bi)006:1019: pa'i phyir gong du theg chen lam gyis gnyer bya
NK045(bi)006:1020: sgrib gnyis spangs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin zhes bshad
NK045(bi)006:1021: kyi gzhan rgyud la bsgrub byar byed pa'i sgo nas
NK045(bi)006:1022: 'byed kyi / phyir dang / ni / mthar thug
NK045(bi)006:1023: gi gnyer bya'am 'bras bur bshad kyang mi 'gal la
NK045(bi)006:1025: rgyas dang rnam mkhyen gnyis kyang skabs 'gar so sor
NK045(bi)006:1026: gsungs kyang don la dbyer med pa nyid do //
NK045(bi)006:1027: de ltar mngon rtogs brgyad po nyid gzhi lam 'bras bur gzhag na mngon rtogs bsdus pa'i skabs su /
NK045(bi)006:1028: yul ni rnam pa gsum po rgyu //
NK045(bi)006:1029: zhes pa'i skabs su rgyu yar sbyar ba dang ma
NK045(bi)006:1030: sbyar ba'i bshad pa gnyis byung yang don la 'dra
NK045(bi)006:1031: bas gzhi mkhyen gsum thos bsam gtan la phab nas
NK045(bi)006:1032: / lam sbyor bzhi bsgom pas nyams su blangs te /
NK045(bi)006:1033: 'bras bu chos sku mngon du byed pa zhes 'chad pa yin no //
NK045(bi)006:1034: yang 'dir bshad pa ltar bsam sbyor gnyis kyi dbang
NK045(bi)006:1035: du byas nas gzhi lam 'bras bu cha gnyis su
NK045(bi)006:1036: byas kyang rung ste dang po 'bras bu rnam pa
NK045(bi)006:1037: thams cad mkhyen pa mngon du bya ba'i ched du
NK045(bi)006:1038: rgyal sras rnams kyi lam thams cad shes pa nyid
NK045(bi)006:1039: la brten nas gzhan phan gyi spyod pa la slob
NK045(bi)006:1040: pa'i sngon du gzhi phung khams skye mched kyi chos
NK045(bi)006:1041: thams cad sgro 'dogs so gnyis dang bral ba'i tshul
NK045(bi)006:1042: du rtogs par byed pa dang /
NK045(bi)006:1043: gnyis pa gzhi mkhyen pa gsum gyis bsdus pa'i chos
NK045(bi)006:1044: thams cad skye med gsum du bsdus nas rnam rdzogs
NK045(bi)006:1045: sbyor bas stong nyid du bsgom zhing /
NK045(bi)006:1046: de la brten nas rang rgyud la skyes pa'i lam
NK045(bi)006:1047: rtogs pa'i ye shes ji snyed pa rim gyis pas
NK045(bi)006:1048: brtan par byas pas gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu rtse
NK045(bi)006:1049: skad gnyis dang / mthar thug gi 'bras bu chos
NK045(bi)006:1050: sku phrin las dang bcas pa mngon du byas nas
NK045(bi)006:1051: 'khor ba ma stongs par gzhan phan gyi phrin las
NK045(bi)006:1052: rgya che zhing rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul 'bad pa
NK045(bi)006:1053: dang rtsol ba med cing lhun gyis grub par 'byung
NK045(bi)006:1054: skad gnyis dang / ba yin no // shin tu dpag par dka' ba rgyal ba'i yum //
NK045(bi)006:1055: ji bzhin dgongs pa 'grel la zla bral ba //
NK045(bi)006:1056: 'phags pa'i bzhed gzhung ma nor 'chad mdzad pa'i //
NK045(bi)006:1057: mkhas pa'i rjes su 'brang nas 'di bris so //
NK045(bi)006:1058: 'di na 'grel pa gzhan las ma bshad pa //
NK045(bi)006:1059: cung zad yod mod mkhas mang legs bshad las //
NK045(bi)006:1060: shugs kyis bstan snyam byams chos gzhan dang yang //
NK045(bi)006:1061: legs par bstun nas brtags te bris pa yin //
NK045(bi)006:1062: theg chen zab mo'i chos 'di yul gnyan zhing //
NK045(bi)006:1063: chos la dbang zos rang bzo bgyis pa yi //
NK045(bi)006:1064: nyes mang mdo las gsungs pa mthong bas na //
NK045(bi)006:1065: de 'drar gyur na snying nas mthol zhing 'chags //
NK045(bi)006:1066: 'on kyang theg mchog zab mo'i lam bzang 'dir //
NK045(bi)006:1067: snying nas mos phyir mdo dang bstan bcos gzhung //
NK045(bi)006:1068: mang por cung zad 'dris goms byas pa'i phyir //
NK045(bi)006:1069: don gyi gnad la 'gal ba med pa nges //
NK045(bi)006:1070: 'di ltar bgyis pa'i bsod nams dpag med kyis //
NK045(bi)006:1071: dmyal ba yi dwags dud 'gro lha ma yin //
NK045(bi)006:1072: gnas ngan len rnams rtag tu spangs byas nas //
NK045(bi)006:1073: rgyal ba byams pa'i zhabs drung skye bar shog /
NK045(bi)006:1074: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyan gyi
NK045(bi)006:1075: dgongs pa 'grel ba las sa'i steng na 'gran zla
NK045(bi)006:1076: dang bral zhing 'dzam gling na nyi zla ltar grags
NK045(bi)006:1077: pa 'phags pa rnam grol sde'i dgongs pa rje btsun
NK045(bi)006:1078: tsong kha pa chen pos ji ltar bkral ba'i rjes
NK045(bi)006:1079: su 'brangs nas spyi don nyung ngu 'di ltar bris
NK045(bi)006:1080: na / snying ltar brtse ba'i mched grogs 'ga' zhig la'ang dgos pa skabs su bab pa dang /
NK045(bi)006:1081: 7skyabs mgon mchog gi thugs la'ang 'thad pa srid dam
NK045(bi)006:1082: snyam nas khyi rgan a bus nags chung ri khrod
NK045(bi)006:1083: du thun bar 'ga' la bris pa dge zhing bkra
NK045(bi)006:1087: zhes pa 'adi'ang sde dge chos rgyal chen po'i gdan
NK045(bi)006:1088: sa sh+r+ai ri lhun 'grub steng gi chos gling du
NK045(bi)006:1089: / gzhan phan dge ba'i sa bon 'phel phyir /
